name: CRYPTIdate
description:
How can the cryptids of the world possibly find love, when they live such reclusive lifestyles?  Enter CRYPTIdate, the world's premier dating service for cryptids!

Match cryptids to their soul mates, and influence new generations of friendly lovesick cryptids! Features eight different lovable (if just a bit terrifying) final form cryptids for you to meet!

Made by Jessica Padkin for Cryptid Jam, using Twine (SugarCube 2.3).

Utilises glitchy text and delayed text sample code made by HiEv.
